books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: An inexperienced college student falls in love with a tortured man who has particular sexual tastes; the first book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES OF GREY

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: Ana Steele learns more about Christian Grey’s troubled past; the second book in a trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES DARKER

books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: The final book in an erotic trilogy.
books.name: FIFTY SHADES FREED

books.author: by Gillian Flynn
books.description: A woman disappears on the day of her fifth anniversary; is her husband a killer?
books.name: GONE GIRL

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Two troubled people develop an intense, obsessive relationship.
books.name: BARED TO YOU

books.author: by Julie Garwood
books.description: An I.R.S. officer and an F.B.I. agent fight corruption, and a mutual attraction, while investigating a Ponzi scheme.
books.name: SWEET TALK

books.author: by Emily Giffin
books.description: A woman’s successful life is disrupted by the appearance of an 18-year-old girl with a link to her past.
books.name: WHERE WE BELONG

books.author: by Lora Leigh
books.description: Stygian’s mission is to find Honor Roberts, a missing Breed, no matter the cost.
books.name: STYGIAN'S HONOR

books.author: by Sherrilyn Kenyon
books.description: Kateri Avani must face a Keetoowah warrior, and Ren Waya must come back from the dead to prevent the world from ending in this Dark-Hunter novel.
books.name: TIME UNTIME

books.author: by Colleen Hoover
books.description: A girl falls in love with a neighbor who enjoys slam poetry, but they encounter obstacles.
books.name: SLAMMED

books.author: by Brad Thor
books.description: If the counterterrorism operative Scot Harvath can discover who has targeted him for death, he can prevent a terrorist attack.
books.name: BLACK LIST

books.author: by M. L. Stedman
books.description: An Australian lighthouse keeper and his wife decide to keep a baby who has washed ashore.
books.name: THE LIGHT BETWEEN OCEANS

books.author: by Lisa Kleypas
books.description: Zoe, an innkeeper in the town of Friday Harbor, has been so hurt in the past that she dare not trust her heart with anyone — especially not the bitter Alex Nolan, who drinks to keep his own demons at bay.
books.name: DREAM LAKE

books.author: by Lisa Jackson
books.description: A woman whose toddler went missing two years ago suspects that he’s still alive.
books.name: YOU DON’T WANT TO KNOW

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: A New York detective takes refuge with his 10 children in an upstate cabin.
books.name: I, MICHAEL BENNETT
